languages.text: "Если бы вы пожелали начать посещение системы Райкад с иных объектов — станция могла бы стать критически нестабильна. Однако решение немедленно отправиться к представителям Навис Нобилите выиграло нам время. Мы можем бросить силы на разбор станции и добычу некоторых технических компонентов для нашего корабля. Или же попытаться забрать как можно больше ценностей".

traits.locale_text: "Если бы вы пожелали начать посещение системы Райкад с иных объектов — станция могла бы стать критически нестабильна. Однако решение немедленно отправиться к представителям Навис Нобилите выиграло нам время. Мы можем бросить силы на разбор станции и добычу некоторых технических компонентов для нашего корабля. Или же попытаться забрать как можно больше ценностей".

languages.text: "Had you opted to begin your visit to the Rykad System with a different destination, the station could have become critically unstable. Fortunately, the decision to immediately visit the representatives of the Navis Nobilite bought us precious time. We can either focus our efforts on disassembling the station and procuring technological components for our own vessel or attempt to save as many valuables as we can."
languages.original_text: "Если бы вы пожелали начать посещение системы Райкад с иных объектов — станция могла бы стать критически нестабильна. Однако решение немедленно отправиться к представителям Навис Нобилите выиграло нам время. Мы можем бросить силы на разбор станции и добычу некоторых технических компонентов для нашего корабля. Или же попытаться забрать как можно больше ценностей".

traits.locale_text: "Had you opted to begin your visit to the Rykad system with a different destination, the station could have become critically unstable. Fortunately, the decision to visit the representatives of Navis Nobilite immediately bought us precious time. We can either send our forces to disassemble the station and procure technological components for our own vessel or attempt to save as many valuables as we can."

We can either send our forces to disassemble the station and procure technological components for our own vessel or attempt to save as many valuables as we can."

Fortunately, the decision to immediately visit the representatives of Navis Nobilite bought us precious time. We can either send our forces to disassemble the station and procure technological components for our own vessel or attempt to save as many valuables as we can."

"Had you opted to begin your visit to the Rykad System with a different destination, the station could have become critically unstable. Fortunately, the decision to immediately visit the representatives of Navis Nobilite bought us precious time. We can either send our forces to disassemble the station and procure technological components for our own vessel or attempt to save as many valuables as we can."

languages.text: « Si vous aviez choisi de commencer votre visite du système de Rykad par une autre destination, la station aurait pu entrer dans un état d'instabilité critique. Par chance, la décision de vous rendre immédiatement auprès des représentants de la Navis Nobilite nous a permis de gagner un temps des plus précieux. Deux possibilités s'offrent maintenant à nous : démanteler la station afin de récupérer des composants utiles pour notre vaisseau, ou tenter de sauver autant d'objets de valeur que possible. »
languages.original_text: "Had you opted to begin your visit to the Rykad System with a different destination, the station could have become critically unstable. Fortunately, the decision to immediately visit the representatives of the Navis Nobilite bought us precious time. We can either focus our efforts on disassembling the station and procuring technological components for our own vessel or attempt to save as many valuables as we can."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous aviez choisi de commencer votre visite du système de Rykad par une autre destination, la station aurait pu entrer dans un état d'instabilité critique. Par chance, la décision de vous rendre immédiatement auprès des représentants de la Navis Nobilite nous a permis de gagner un temps des plus précieux. Deux possibilités s'offrent maintenant à nous : démanteler la station afin de récupérer des composants utiles pour notre vaisseau, ou tenter de sauver autant d'objets de valeur que possible. »

languages.text: "Hättet Ihr entschieden, Euren Besuch im Rykad-System an einem anderen Ort zu beginnen, hätte die Station kritisch instabil werden können. Glücklicherweise hat uns die Entscheidung, die Vertreter der Navis Nobilite sofort zu besuchen, wertvolle Zeit erkauft. Wir können uns entweder darauf konzentrieren, die Station zu demontieren und einzelne Bauteile für unser Schiff wiederzuverwerten, oder versuchen, möglichst viele Wertgegenstände zu retten."
languages.original_text: "Had you opted to begin your visit to the Rykad System with a different destination, the station could have become critically unstable. Fortunately, the decision to immediately visit the representatives of the Navis Nobilite bought us precious time. We can either focus our efforts on disassembling the station and procuring technological components for our own vessel or attempt to save as many valuables as we can."

traits.locale_text: "Hättet Ihr entschieden, Euren Besuch im Rykad-System an einem anderen Ort zu beginnen, hätte die Station kritisch instabil werden können. Glücklicherweise hat uns die Entscheidung, die Vertreter der Navis Nobilite sofort zu besuchen, wertvolle Zeit erkauft. Wir können uns entweder darauf konzentrieren, die Station zu demontieren und einzelne Bauteile für unser Schiff wiederzuverwerten, oder versuchen, möglichst viele Wertgegenstände zu retten."

"Hättet Ihr entschieden, Euren Besuch im Rykad-System an einem anderen Ort zu beginnen, hätte die Station kritisch instabil werden können. Glücklicherweise hat uns die Entscheidung, die Vertreter der Navis Nobilite sofort zu besuchen, wertvolle Zeit erkauft. Wir können entweder unsere Truppen schicken, die Station zu demontieren und technologische Bauteile für unser eigenes Schiff wiederzuverwerten, oder wir können versuchen, möglichst viele Wertgegenstände zu retten."

languages.text: «Si hubiera aterrizado en una ubicación diferente del sistema Rykad, la estación podría haber alcanzado un estado crítico. Por suerte, hemos ganado un tiempo valioso al decidir visitar a los representantes de la Navis Nobilite en primer lugar. Podemos centrar nuestros esfuerzos en desmontar la estación y buscar componentes tecnológicos para nuestra nave o intentar recuperar todos los objetos de valor que podamos».
languages.original_text: "Had you opted to begin your visit to the Rykad System with a different destination, the station could have become critically unstable. Fortunately, the decision to immediately visit the representatives of the Navis Nobilite bought us precious time. We can either focus our efforts on disassembling the station and procuring technological components for our own vessel or attempt to save as many valuables as we can."

traits.locale_text: «Si hubiera aterrizado en una ubicación diferente del sistema Rykad, la estación podría haber alcanzado un estado crítico. Por suerte, hemos ganado un tiempo valioso al decidir visitar a los representantes de la Navis Nobilite en primer lugar. Podemos centrar nuestros esfuerzos en desmontar la estación y buscar componentes tecnológicos para nuestra nave o intentar recuperar todos los objetos de valor que podamos».

languages.text: “如果您打算造访莱卡德星系的其他目的地，这座星站可能会变得极其不稳定。幸运的是，立即拜访导航宗族代表的决定，为我们赢得了宝贵的时间。我们可以派遣部队拆解这座星站，为我们自己的舰船收集技术部件，或是尽可能低挽救贵重物品。”
languages.original_text: "Had you opted to begin your visit to the Rykad System with a different destination, the station could have become critically unstable. Fortunately, the decision to immediately visit the representatives of the Navis Nobilite bought us precious time. We can either focus our efforts on disassembling the station and procuring technological components for our own vessel or attempt to save as many valuables as we can."

traits.locale_text: “如果您打算造访莱卡德星系的其他目的地，这座星站可能会变得极其不稳定。幸运的是，立即拜访导航宗族代表的决定，为我们赢得了宝贵的时间。我们可以派遣部队拆解这座星站，为我们自己的舰船收集技术部件，或是尽可能低挽救贵重物品。”
“如果您打算造访莱卡德星系的其他目的地，这座星站可能会变得极其不稳定。幸运的是，立即拜访导航宗族代表的决定，为我们赢得了宝贵的时间。我们可以派遣部队拆解这座星站，为我们自己的舰船收集技术部件，或是尽可能低挽救贵重物品。”

languages.text: 「もし陛下が別の所からライカド星系へ訪れることにしていたら、ステーションは危険で手遅れな状態だったかもしれません。幸いにも航宙貴族の代表の下をすぐに訪れることにしたので、貴重な時間稼ぎになりました。今後の行動方針としては、部隊を派遣してステーションを解体し、我々の船のために技術関連のものを調達してもいいですし、できる限り価値ある資源の回収に注力するか、選択せねばなりません」
languages.original_text: "Had you opted to begin your visit to the Rykad System with a different destination, the station could have become critically unstable. Fortunately, the decision to immediately visit the representatives of the Navis Nobilite bought us precious time. We can either focus our efforts on disassembling the station and procuring technological components for our own vessel or attempt to save as many valuables as we can."

traits.locale_text: 「もし陛下が別の所からライカド星系へ訪れることにしていたら、ステーションは危険で手遅れな状態だったかもしれません。幸いにも航宙貴族の代表の下をすぐに訪れることにしたので、貴重な時間稼ぎになりました。今後の行動方針としては、部隊を派遣してステーションを解体し、我々の船のために技術関連のものを調達してもいいですし、できる限り価値ある資源の回収に注力するか、選択せねばなりません」

languages.text: "Rykad Sistemi'ne ziyaretinize farklı bir noktadan başlamayı tercih etseniz istasyon, kritik tehlike altında olabilirdi. Neyse ki Navis Nobilite temsilcilerini hemen ziyaret etmeye karar vermeniz bize zaman kazandırdı. Şu an istasyonu parçalarına ayırmaları için kuvvetlerimizi gönderebilir ve teknolojik bileşenlerini kendi gemimize kazandırabiliriz. Tabii bunun yerine kurtarabildiğimiz kadar çok değerli mal kurtarmaya çalışabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "Had you opted to begin your visit to the Rykad System with a different destination, the station could have become critically unstable. Fortunately, the decision to immediately visit the representatives of the Navis Nobilite bought us precious time. We can either focus our efforts on disassembling the station and procuring technological components for our own vessel or attempt to save as many valuables as we can."
